name: fileDownloadXLS
description: A custom widget designed to work with Excel or XLS files, helping you retrieve file data in JSON, raw, and multiple other formats

setHierarchyStructure.description: Sets the hierarchical structure for the data.

setFilterByValue.description: Applies a filter to records based on a constant value.

exportXML.description: Applies a filter to records based on a value that contains a specific character.

getDataAsJson.description: Retrieves uploaded data in JSON/Selection/Object format.

gettest1.description: Retrieves uploaded data in raw string format.

getTotalRecordsCount.description: Gets the total count of records.

getHeaders.description: Gets the headers of uploaded data as an array.
